channel.title: Xuyao Zhang on Chiu Yu Ko
channel.description: Recent content in Xuyao Zhang on Chiu Yu Ko

item.title: Research Joint Venture with Technology Transfer
item.description: An industry-wide research joint venture (RJV) does not lead to better technological development or a higher consumer surplus. In contrast, every non-industry-wide RJV leads to strict improvements in both measures. Our results continue to hold when technology transfer is possible. Independent collaboration with technology transfer is an alternative to establishing industry-wide research consortiums.
